channel.title: Need help rep ++
channel.description:
src\server\model\players\packets\ClickItem.java:112: illegal start of expression

how else should i start a switch statement someone help me?

item.title: Need help rep ++

item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Say there was a method like this public void itemHere(int itemId) { }]/code] The int declared in the method is the int you would switch. [code=java]switch (itemId) {
Then you could continue with cases from there.
